entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
